title: The Astrosmurf
description: Dreamy's wish to become an Astrosmurf comes true when Papa Smurf puts him to sleep, magically transforming the landscape and the Smurfs into a space fantasy. Gargamel keeps close watch on their antics through his crystal ball, but he too falls victim to Papa Smurf's magic and is sent into a thunderstorm.

title: St. Smurf and the Dragon
description: A baby dragon helps Papa Smurf locate more magical glowberries. / Gargamel creates the legend of Sorcerer Smurf to lure Papa and his friends to a mountain trap.

title: Bewitched, Bothered and Be-Smurfed
description: The Smurfs find a "meanie genie" who refuses to grant them their wishes until they call out the magic word. / Hogartha loses her magic locket in the Smurf's forest and convinces Gargamel to help search for it.

title: King Smurf/The Smurfs and the Howlibird
description: An accident with Papa Smurf's growth formula turns a Howlibird into a giant.

title: Soup a La Smurf
description: A terrible giant called Bigmouth helps Gargamel hunt the Smurfs so he can feast on Soup a la Smurf. Papa Smurf tricks the big monster and then convinces him that Soup a la Gargamel is far more an appetizing dish than smurfy soup.

title: All That Glitters Isn't Smurf/Dreamy's Nightmare
Romeo and Smurfette
description: Papa Smurf plans to rescue 10 captured Smurfs from Gargamel by using a mountain of fake gold. / Hefty and Handy, not to mention everyone else, compete for the amourous attention of Smurfette.

title: Sideshow Smurfs
description: Clumsy and Smurfette are captured by Bombast, who plans to exhibit them in his sideshow.

title: Sir Hefty
description: Sir Hefty and a wayward knight battle a dragon whose fire threatens the forest.

title: The Baby Smurf/The Fake Smurf
description: The Fake Smurf: Hogatha transforms herself into a Smurf, plotting revenge on the little people for destroying her magic locket. The Baby Smurf: Gargamel transforms himself into a Baby Smurf, to be adopted by Smurfette. He causes complete chaos in the Smurf Village when he tries to blow it up with a time bomb.

title: Painter and Poet
description: Poet and Painter leave the village when they feel unappreciated, and head unwittingly into Gargamel's trap.

title: Haunted Smurf/The Purple Smurfs
description: An epidemic turns the happy blue Smurfs into angry purple Smurfs. / The Smurfs travel to a distant, haunted castle in search of shelter after their winter food supply is destroyed.

title: The Fountain of Smurf
description: The Smurfs discover a fountain of youth that is guarded by a wicked troll, who steals Papa SmurfâEUR(TM)s magic book. They convince Gargamel to help them and the greedy villain runs to get the water, but manages to fall in with the troll. As the two chase each other all over the countryside, the Smurfs are able to retrieve Papa SmurfâEUR(TM)s book.

title: The Magnifying Mixture/Foul Weather Smurf
description: Hefty uses Brainy's enlarging potion to grow to human size and battle Gargamel. / Handy invents a weather machine.

title: The Hundredth Smurf
description: Bad luck invades the Smurf Village, and 100 Smurfs are needed to dance a magical dance to restore good fortune. / Harmony is forbidden to play in the Smurf Symphony, which Gargamel uses to convince the musical Smurf to play a magic instrument that lulls the others to sleep.

title: The Abominable Snowbeast/Gargamel, the Generous
description: Brainy and his friends meet a snow beast while on a trip to Ice Mountain . / Gargamel fakes friendliness to discover where the Smurf's secret diamond stash is hidden.

title: The Smurfette
description: Recalling Gargamel's creation of Smurfette, where the female Smurf is magically created as a spy to help the evil wizard and Azrael do away with the Smurfs once and for all. Smurfette tricks Greedy into opening the Smurf River Dam (to flood the village), but later -- when he realizes Smurfette wants to be "a real Smurf" -- Papa Smurf has an ace up his sleeve.

title: Now You Smurf 'Em, Now You Don't/Spelunking Smurfs
description: Underground trolls use a crystal ball that lets Smurfs see their fondest wishes in order to kidnap whoever touches it. / The Smurfs discover a fountain of youth guarded by a troll, who steals Papa Smurf's magic book.

title: The Clockwork Smurf
description: Handy invents clockwork Smurf, a robot designed to take the work out of work, but Brainy de-programs him to leave the Smurf Village. The Clockwork Smurf journeys to a distant castle where he convinces a young prince to return to the Smurfs so they can help him regain his kingdom from his wicked aunt.

title: Fuzzle Trouble/Smurfette's Dancing Shoes
description: Clumsy's new furry, fuzzy friend causes plenty of trouble in the Smurf village with its eating - and reproduction - habits. Meanwhile, a woodland imp gives Smurfette a pair of dancing shoes with a sinister secret.

title: The Smurfs and the Money Tree
description: Gargamel The Generous: In an effort to find out where the SmurfsâEUR(TM) secret diamond stash is hidden, Gargamel pretends to be their friend. The Smurfs And The Money Tree: The evil wizard Gargamel, true to form and helped by his mum (not exactly a nice lady), has hatched a plan thatâEUR(TM)s even more diabolical than anything before: to tempt the Smurfs, who have no concept of money, with the lure of personal profit. Will Greedy Smurf takeÂ the bait?

title: The Smurf Who Couldn't Say No
description: Going to the Marsh to bring back the rare Foxfire is a great honor. But Scaredy Smurf is reluctant to confront the Marsh Monster. So who is going to the Marsh, but the Smurf who cannot say no?

title: The Adventures of Robin Smurf
description: The Smurfs' theatrical production of 'Robin Smurf' comes to life as the legendary hero is portrayed by a really actor...

title: The Cursed Country
description: An evil master uses a fire-breathing dragon to capture slaves for his diamond mine, but the Smurfs find a way to douse the flames.

title: Revenge of the Smurfs
description: When the village is destroyed by heedless knights, a band of Smurfs seeks vengeance.

title: The Three Smurfketeers
description: The Smurfs' production of "The Three Smurfketeers" includes some scenes from "Romeo And Juliet."

title: Heavenly Smurfs/It Came from Outer Smurf
description: No one believes it when Dreamy talks about a friend from outer space but Papa wonders when he spots a flying saucer.

title: Squeaky/The Kaplowey Scroll
description: Smurfette learns about life and death when she adopts a mouse named Squeaky. Clumsy accidentally finds an ancient scroll whose spell wreaks havoc whenever someone exclaims "Kaplowey!"

title: The Goblin of Boulder Wood
description: Peewit tells the tale of how he first met Johan.

title: The Lost City of Yore
description: Curiosity brings Nosey Smurf to the lair of the Hag Sisters, who want to find the terrifying Sceptre of Yore... And Gargamel wants to cheat the two witches as he tries to destroy the Smurfs.

title: The Magic Fountain
description: A search for a magic fountain by Johan, Peewit, and the Smurfs is the only hope for an enslaved people.

title: For the Love of Gargamel/The A-Maze-ing Smurfs
Smurfs at Sea
description: Papa Smurf recalls Dreamy's exciting voyage on the high seas and his gripping adventures with sea turtles, whales desert islands... and pirates!

title: One Good Smurf Deserves Another
description: When Clumsy tries to repay Handy's kindness, the other Smurfs plot to stage a phony rescue.

title: The Ring of Castellac
description: A drugged duke needs to be returned to his rightful place by Johan, Peewit, and the Smurfs.

title: The Sky Is Smurfing, the Sky Is Smurfing/Turncoat Smurf
description: The Sky Is Smurfing: Scaredy Smurf runs into the Village screaming about the sky being about to Smurf down. And just at the same moment, Papa Smurf is beset by uncontrollable fits of sneezing.... Turncoat Smurf: Would you believe Brainy Smurf is the one who led the evil Gargamel to the Village of the Smurf? Of course he did not. But the others suspect him...

title: The Return of the Clockwork Smurf
The Littlest Giant
description: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel enters the scene.

title: Bubble, Bubble, Smurfs in Trouble/Smurf Van Winkle
description: A trick backfires when the Smurfs pretend to have aged during one of Lazy's naps and he innocently gives them a reverse-aging potion which lands some very little Smurfs in Gargamel's stewpot.

title: Sleepwalking Smurfs/Smurf Me No Flowers
description: A sleepless Lazy thinks he's dying and sets out to do all the dangerous things he was always too sleepy to do before.

title: The Good, the Bad, and the Smurfy
description: King Argon is a burly, boorish brute, but his wizard Mordain is worse still. He plans to use several Smurfs he has captured to steal all of the King's gold.

title: A Mere Truffle
description: A craving for truffles leads the Smurfs into danger as they venture into the caves of the Truffle Trolls.

title: The Stuff Dreams Are Smurfed Of/The Box of Dirty Tricks
description: The Box Of Dirty Tricks: What is in this curious box that the Smurfs found on the riverbank? If they knew, the Smurfs would not dream of opening it. And they would avoid Gargamel's clutches. Sleepwalking Smurfs: This time, Gargamel feels sure he has found the final solution to the vexing Smurf question. His magic flute is going to turn their peaceful slumber into a nightmare...

title: Papa's Wedding Day
description: Papa Smurf falls in love with a woodnymph named Flowerbell, unaware that her seductive charms are part of a plot hatched by Balthazar to capture all the woodland animals, in his latest scheme to overthrow Lord Homnibus and rule the kingdom with an autocratic hand. But Flowerbell's freedom, much less livelihood, will depend on her success.

title: All's Smurfy That Ends Smurfy
description: Gargamel's theft of the Faeries' gold almost brings a state of war between the Faeries and the Smurfs.

title: Once in a Blue Moon/All Creatures Great and Smurf
description: A legend tells it that once in a blue moon, a baby Smurf is delivered to the Smurfs. This time, the Smurfs become attached and when the stork delcares a mistake has been been made, Smurfette and Grouchy protest the baby's removal.

title: The Smurf Fire Brigade/The Winged Wizard
Every Picture Smurfs a Story
description: The evil Maestro's magical paints have the power to transport his models onto canvas - forever.

title: The Magic Earrings
description: Handy's Kite: Brainy and Dreamy accompany Handy on a wild kite ride that lands them in the clutches of the evil Balthazar.The Magic Earrings : Hogatha obtains the magic golden earrings of Sonoria, which enable her to hear Smurf voices from afar.

title: The Last Smurfberry
description: Papa organizes a crew to sail to Smurfberry island because Gargamel has set a trap by killing all but one of the mainland trees.

title: A Little Smurf Confidence/Hogatha's Heartthrob
description: A Little Smurf Confidence: Papa gives Weakling a special cream that will restore his strength.Hogatha's Heart Throb: Hogatha promises Gargamel a magical whistle if he'll introduce her to the warlock of her dreams.

title: Born Rotten/The Tear of a Smurf
description: Born Rotten: As the Smurfs prepare for a star festival, Gargamel plants a smelly alien in their midst.The Tear of a Smurf: A pretty princess is turned into a hag and needs the whiskers of a cat and the tear of a Smurf for the antidote.

title: The Miracle Smurfer
description: The Smurfs are fooled by a charlatan's outrageously expensive "miracle" tonic.

title: The Smurf Who Would Be King
description: The Smurf Who Would Be King: Dreamy finds his dreams of royalty coming true when he falls into the land of Pookies.How to Smurf a Rainbow: Mother Nature is too busy to make a rainbow for the festival so Papa borrows her cookbook to make one himself.

title: How to Smurf a Rainbow/Smurfette for a Day
Handy's Sweetheart
description: The Smurfs help a sea mermaid named Marina retrieve special medicines for her father. In the process, Handy Smurf ends up falling in love with her.

title: Speak for Yourself, Farmer Smurf/A Hovel Is Not a Home
description: Lumbering Smurfs: Greedy lumberjacks plan to level King Gerard's forests while he's on vacation.Speak For Yourself Farmer Smurf: Farmer hides his love for Smurfette by assuming a disguise and sending her poems.

title: Baby Smurf Is Missing/The Smurfs' Time Capsule
description: As the Smurfs build a time capsule for their talents, Papa frantically tries to unravel an ancient Druid riddle before disaster can strike the forest.

title: Wedding Bells for Gargamel/To Smurf a Thief
description: Wedding Bells for Gargamel: The Smurfs befriend a maiden in distress who is betrothed to Gargamel.To Smurf a Thief: The Smurfs and Homnibus befriend a boy whose master forces him to steal.

title: Greedy and the Porridge Pot/Harmony Steals the Show
description: Greedy and the Porridge Pot: The good fairy Gunilda gives Greedy a magic unending porridge pot.Harmony Steals the Show: Harmony unwittingly signs a contract with the Ghost Writer for a symphony that imprisons him in a ghostly nightclub for life.

title: The Golden Smurf Award
description: Hogartha disguises herself as the Golden Smurf Award to catch the Smurfs and use them as the main ingredient in her beauty cream.

title: The Moor's Baby/Hefty's Heart
description: The Smurfs learn about algebra when everyone needs the services of the Tooth Fairy, who is mysteriously trapped in a cave.

title: A Hug for Grouchy/The Magic Rattle
All Hallows' Eve/The Littlest Witch
description: Baby Smurf Is Missing: While Brainy and Taylor Smurf are arguing Baby Smurf wanders off into the forest and is captured by poachers. Thinking Baby is a Leprechaun; they decide to make Baby tell them where they can find his pot of gold. When Papa Smurf finds out that Baby is missing, all the Smurfs head off to the forest to search. They finally catch up with the poachers and sneak in to rescue Baby. The Littlest Witch: The Smurfs discover a young witch called Brenda transforming forest animals. They soon discover that she is trying to learn to be evil. In an attempt to convince her that being good is better, they take her to their village to get Papa SmurfÂ's help. Unknowingly they are being followed by the young witchÂ's evil teacher. When the evil witch snatches Scary, the Smurfs and Brenda give chase. Brenda saves the day when she uses her powers for good and Scary is rescued.

title: April Smurf's Day/The Magic Stick
description: Jokey tries to avoid the pranksters on April Smurf's Day as Gargamel disguises himself as a smurfberry bush for his own evil prank. Clumsy makes trouble for everyone when he borrows Papa Smurf's magic stick.

title: Baby's First Christmas/Beauty Is Only Smurf Deep
description: The evil Chlorhydrus puts a spell on Mr. Nicholas to ruin Christmas.

title: Wolf in Peewit's Clothing/A Bell for Azrael
description: HogathaÂ's Heartthrob: When Hogatha, while en route to meet her heartthrob the Harlequin, finds herself in one of GargamelÂ's Smurf traps and she makes a deal with him. In return for a Magic Smurf Summoning Whistle Gargamel will introduce her to the Harlequin. As they each depart to get ready, little do they know that they each intend to deceive the other. HogathaÂ's whistle is neither magical nor will summon Smurfs and Gargamel intends to disguise himself as the Harlequin. A Bell For Azrael: After being chased by Azrael, Brainy comes up with a plan to stop Azrael sneaking up on the Smurfs. With the help of some of his friends he tries to put a bell on Azrael. When Garagmel hears a commotion outside he finds a bell tied on Azrael. Gargamel casts a spell on the bell which will now ring when a Smurf is nearby. After Papa Smurf is chased by Azrael and finds out about the bell, he places a counter spell on the bell which leads Gargamel to Bigmouth the Giant.

title: The Chief Record Smurf/Smurfing in Sign Language
description: A Bell For Azrael: Gargamel puts a spell on a bell attached to Azrael's tail that will lead him to the Smurfs.The Chief Record Smurf: A wild experiment leaves Clumsy able to store endless knowledge into his memory.

title: Chip Off the Old Smurfs
description: Smurfing in Sign Language: The Smurfs meet a woodland elf who teaches them sign language after Gargamel inflicts a "no speaking" spell on them.A Chip off the Old Smurf: Disaster strikes when Brainy and Baby mix up Papa's formulas.

title: A Gift for Papa's Day
description: Forget Me Smurfs: While climbing Mount Smurf to see how deep the snow is Sickly, Brainy and Smurfette come across some strange flowers. Sickly refuses to smell them while the others do. They soon begin to act strangely. When the Smurfs return, the rest of the village smells the strange flowers too and start to act strangely. Worried Sickly runs off to find Mother Nature to cure the Smurfs. A Gift For PapaÂ's Day: It is PapaÂ's Day and the Smurfs have made a special hat for Papa Smurf. Not really liking the hat but not wanting to upset the Smurfs he tries to lose the hat by accident. Gargamel finds the hat and uses it to trap the Smurfs. When Papa Smurf finds out he tricks Gargamel and with help from Feathers he frees the Smurfs.

title: Hats Off to Smurfs/The Noble Stag
description: King Gerard has been turned into a black stag by his wicked cousin Malcolm, who plans to kill him and mount him in his trophy room. But the loyal little Smurfs help their friend regain his form and his throne.

title: Smurfy Acres/No Time for Smurfs
description: In "Smurfy Acres," Gargamel creates a more upscale Smurf Village to lure the Smurfs out of hiding.

title: Symbols of Wisdom/Blue Eyes Returns
description: Symbols Of Wisdom: Brainy and Gargamel each grow a beard to be more like Papa.Blue Eyes Returns: Gargamel's efforts to end a drought results in a flood, and the Smurfs build an ark.

title: Secret of the Village Well/Stop and Smurf the Roses
description: Clumsy's fellow Smurfs are curious to know what he wished for after he threw Gargamel's penny down the well. Meanwhile Chlohydrous casts a spell to destroy the flowers ... and it could have deadly consequences for the Smurf's beautiful woodelf friend, Laconia.

title: The Gingerbread Smurfs/Jokey's Shadow
description: The Gingerbread Smurfs: Brainy and Clumsy compete in a gingerbread bake-off that produces some unusual recipes.Jokey's Shadow: Jokey spills a vial of Mother Nature's spring pollen on his shadow, and the potent mix brings it to life.

title: Jokey's Funny Bone/Tick Tock Smurfs
description: Jokey's Funny Bone: Jealous of the attention Vanity gets for a broken toe, Jokey feigns illness.Tick Tock Smurfs: Smurf Village gets a clock, and Brainy designs a schedule so the Smurfs will be more efficient.

title: The Master Smurf/Tailor's Magic Needle
description: The Master Smurf: Miner finds a crown which casts an evil spell over Greedy, making him think he's king.Tailor's Magic Needle: Brainy's magic sewing needle is magically fast but notoriously unreliable and destructive.

title: The Traveler/A Pet for Baby Smurf
description: The Traveler: A dragon terrorizes the village, and the only solution is to replace the Eyes of the Idol.A Pet For Baby Smurf: The Smurfs hold a pet show, but Baby Smurf's new pet is actually one of Gargamel's ploys to catch the Smurfs.

title: The Incredible Shrinking Wizard
description: Gargamel begins shrinking when he accidentally falls into his polluted pond, and can be cured only if he does good deeds.

title: Breakfast at Greedy's/The Secret of Shadow Swamp
description: Breakfast At Greedy's: Spurred on by his mother, Gargamel tries hard to catch a Smurf.The Secret Of Shadow Swamp: Grouchy wanders away from his own birthday party and into the Shadow Swamp.

title: The Trojan Smurf/Smurf the Other Cheek
description: The Trojan Smurf: Using the Trojan horse plan, Gargamel makes a giant Papa Smurf to hide in and Brainy delivers it into the village.Smurf The Other Cheek: Ignoring Papa's lecture on fighting, Hefty gives in to the temptation to kick a troll.

title: A Float Full of Smurfs/Smurfette's Sweet Tooth
description: A Float Full Of Smurfs: The Smurfs must find a rabbit family to pull their float in the Autumn Carnival.Smurfette's Sweet Tooth: Handy makes a years' worth of candy for every Smurf and Smurfette succumbs to her sweet tooth.

title: Smurf on Wood
description: Gargamel searches for a magic toad as the Smurfs discover a "magic tree" that brings them to a confrontation with the wizard.

title: The Smurfomatic Smurfulator/Petrified Smurfs
description: The Smurfomatic Smurfulator: Handy's new invention comes in handy when Gargamel unleashes a virulent weed seed on the village.Petrified Smurfs: Brainy accidentally recites a spell that turns everything to stone, even Papa Smurf.

title: Papa's Worrywarts/Lazy's Slumber Party
description: Papa's Worry Warts: Papa Smurf breaks out in worrywarts and needs to rub a Wartmonger's horn to cure himself. Lazy's Slumber Party: Brainy dares Tuffy to paint Big Mouth's toenails at Lazy's slumber party.

title: The Pussywillow Pixies
description: Clumsy's misadventures take him across the river into Pussy Willow Hollow, and his rescuers fall into danger when they try to free him and the Willows from the Wartmongers.

title: The Big Nose Dilemma/The Smurfbox Derby
description: The Big Nose Dilemma: Dissatisfied with their noses, Gargamel, Big Nose and Vanity trade features and realize their new noses have problems.Smurf Box Derby: The Smurfs hold a car race to determine the best automobile model for the overworked Handy.

title: A Circus for Baby
description: The Smurfs meet a circus elephant and decide to put on a circus performance of their own for Baby Smurf.

title: Babes in Wartland/The Smurf-Walk Cafe
description: Babes In Wartland: Baby Smurf drifts downriver from a picnic and is found by the Pussy Willow Pixies.The Smurf-Walk Cafe: Handy and Greedy open an ice cream parlor.

title: The Smurfiest of Friends/Never Smurf Off Til Tomorrow
description: The Smurfiest Of Friends: When Brainy and Clumsy's friendship dissolves, Brainy is shunned by the other Smurfs. Never Smurf Off 'Til Tomorrow: The Smurfs face a dangerous situation for which they blame Lazy.

title: Bigmouth Smurf/Baby's Enchanted Didey
description: Bigmouth Smurf: Plotting to rid himself of the Smurfs, Gargamel casts a spell over Bigmouth and disguises him as a Smurf.Baby's Enchanted Didey: Gargamel converts a bedspread into a flying carpet, but crashes.

title: The Man in the Moon/Smurfette's Golden Tresses
description: The Man In The Moon: The Man In The Moon quits when he feels unappreciated. Will the Smurfs' moon festival lure him back?Smurfette's Golden Tresses: Hogatha and Smurfette grow dissatisfied with their appearance.

title: The Whole Smurf and Nothing But the Smurf/Gargamel's Giant
description: "The Whole Smurf and Nothing But the Smurf" has Gargamel attempt to use a truth potion on Smurfette to tell him how to get to Smurf Village, only to use a lying spell by mistake.

title: The Patchwork Bear/Hefty and the Wheelsmurfer
description: The Patchwork Bear: The Smurfs battle an evil ice pirate, Krako, who has frozen the River Smurf and kidnapped the Emerald Empress. Hefty And The Wheelsmurfer: When Hefty breaks his leg, he learns about being handicapped.

title: Hopping Cough Smurfs/The Little Orange Horse with the Gold Shoes
description: Hopping Cough Smurfs: Gargamel infects the Smurfs with hopping cough.The Little Orange Horse with the Gold Shoes: Smurfette helps a little rainbow-sliding horse find his lost shoe.

title: Monster Smurfs/The Bad Place
description: Monster Smurfs: Brainy turns the others into monsters for Spook-A-Smurf Eve, but no one likes being a monster.The Bad Place: Aliens called the Grimeys are stranded near Smurf Village until they can repair their broken ship.

title: Smurfing for Ghosts/The Gargoyle of Quarrel Castle
description: Smurfing for Ghosts: Peewit is castle-sitting when he discovers a shy ghost.The Gargoyle Of Quarrel Castle: Tharp, the gargoyle of Quarrel Castle, feels unloved until a brush with danger proves how much his parents love him.

title: Smurfiplication/Gargamel's Miss-Fortune
description: Smurfiplication: Gargamel invents a magic liquid that is capable of duplicating everything it touches.Gargamel's Miss-Fortune: Still nursing a bruise from his attempt to catch a Smurf, Gargamel promises Ezmeralda a bag of gold if she'll help him.

title: Stuck on Smurfs/Puppy
description: Stuck on Smurfs: Gargamel becomes stuck to the Smurfs when his plan to glue them together backfires.Puppy: Homnibus gives the Smurfs a dog which they name Puppy, but Balthazar snatches the pup.

title: Papa's Day Off/The Smurflings
description: Papa's Day Off: The Smurfs agree to settle their own problems for a day so Papa can have a little vacation, but Papa soon feels useless.The Smurflings: Three grown Smurfs become Smurflings when they step into a time machine running backward.

title: He Who Smurfs Last/Baby's First Word
description: He Who Smurfs Last: Chlorhydris steals the Smurfs' sense of humor when she's irritated by one of Jokey's pranks.Baby's First Word: The Smurflings free the Smurfs from Gargamel just in time for Baby's first-word ceremony.

title: The Masked Pie Smurfer/Sassette
description: The Masked Pie-Smurfer: The quarrelling Smurfs use a masked pie-thrower to take revenge on each other.Sassette: Snappy and Nat steal Gargamel's formula to make another Smurf, and create a sister for Smurfette.

title: Papa's Puppy Prescription/Poet's Writer's Block
description: Papa's Puppy Prescription: Gargamel's new spell makes Puppy think he's a cat.Poet's Writer's Block: Poet runs away to seek inspiration to cure his writer's block and ends up being held hostage by the Wilybeast King.

title: Smurf a Mile in My Shoes
description: Jokey learns about humility when he helps out a tortured sand troll that he teased.

title: Dreamy's Pen Pals/Papa's Flying Bed
description: Dreamy's Pen Pals: Papa tries to protect Dreamy from learning that his pen-friends the Swoofs don't exist.Papa's Flying Bed: Gargamel casts a spell on Papa Smurf's bed so anyone who sleeps in it is transported to the location they dream about.

title: Mud Wrestling Smurfs/The Sand Witch
description: Mud Wrestling Smurfs: Clumsy agrees to a mud-wrestling match with the Mad Masher to save Smurf River from the Wartmongers' mud machines.The Sand Witch: A swamp monster kidnaps Baby as a gift for a witch.

title: Kow-Tow, We Won't Bow
description: Puppy helps Smurfette escape from the Wartmongers.

title: Bigmouth's Friend/Wild and Wooly
description: Bigmouth's Friend: Clockwork's new friend Big Mouth comes to his rescue when Gargamel and Balthazar order a giant robot to steal the mechanical Smurf.Wild & Wooly: Wooly and the Smurflings team up to get wool for winter clothes.

title: The Dark-Ness Monster
description: Brainy loses his glasses and becomes helpless without Clumsy's assistance, making him regret his previous treatment of the klutzy Smurf.

title: The Grouchiest Game in Town/Queen Smurfette
description: The Grouchiest Game In Town: A strange little imp who is a master of games turns the Smurflings into game pieces and challenges Grouchy.Queen Smurfette: Smurfette's reign as Queen for a day lasts a lot longer when Father Time falls asleep.

title: Marco Smurf and the Pepper Pirates
description: The Pepper Pirates give a seafaring Smurf some trouble.

title: Educating Bigmouth/Brainy Smurf, Friend to All the Animals
description: Educating Bigmouth: Big Nose kicks Big Mouth out, and the Smurfs try to help him learn some manners so she'll take him back.Brainy Smurf, Friend to All the Animals: Brainy roams the forest to do good deeds for animals.

title: The Comet Is Coming
description: The Smurfs think the world is ending when part of a note from Papa gets lost.

title: Happy Unhappiness Day to You/The Great Slime Crop Failure
description: Happy Unhappiness Day To You!: The Smurfs observe Unhappiness Day, when they are sad so as to appreciate their year-round joy.The Great Slime Crop Failure: Farmer is captured by a Wartmongers, who force him to cure a failing slime harvest.

title: Papa's Family Album
description: Papa Smurf tells the Smurflings about his first adventure.

title: Love Those Smurfs/Mutiny on the Smurf
description: Love Those Smurfs: The Smurfs become selfish when a sorceress casts a spell that makes them love only themselves. Mutiny On The Smurf: Brainy's orchestra is kidnapped by King Symphonium and the Smurflings set sail to rescue them.

title: Things That Go Smurf in the Night/Alarming Smurfs
description: Things That Go Smurf In The Night: Snappy loses his teddy bear and can't get to sleep despite Papa's assurance that teddy bears have magic powers.Alarming Smurfs: When the Smurflings run away, the other Smurfs think that thieves struck the Village.

title: Smurfette's Rose/The Mr. Smurf Contest
description: Smurfette's Rose: Mother Nature agrees to create a blue rose if no one cuts it.The Mister Smurf Contest: The Smurfs compete for the honor of escorting Sassette to the Harvest Moon Ball.

title: Have You Smurfed Your Pet, Today?/Unsound Smurfs
description: Have You Smurfed Your Pet Today?: Puppy is captured by Gargamel after the Smurfs forget to feed him.Unsound Smurfs: Brainy tries to give Papa some peace and quiet by creating a magical sound barrier around the village.

title: All Work and No Smurf/Gargamel's Time Trip
description: All Work And No Smurf: The adult Smurfs are overworked by Brainy on their day off.Gargamel's Time Trip: Gargamel steals Father Time's hourglass to destroy the Smurfs in the past.

title: They're Smurfing Our Song
description: Gargamel casts a spell on Woody's magical spell, changing its power from good to evil.

title: Brainy's Smarty Party
description: Brainy invites all the Smurfs to his party, but throws them out when they don't follow his instructions.

title: Gargamel's New Job
description: Gargamel takes a job as Prince Theodore's court magician.

title: Grouchy Makes a Splash
description: Grouchy Makes a Splash: Grouchy loses his fear of swimming when he sees Gargamel kidnapping Baby.Farmer's Genie: Farmer releases an inept genie from a gourd.

title: No Smurf Is an Island/Don Smurfo
The Prince and the Hopper
description: The smurfs encounter a Prince turned into a Frog by an evil sorcerer, and must help him be kissed by his true love before he permanently becomes a frog forever.

title: Smurfette's Gift/The Most Popular Smurf
description: The Most Popular Smurf: Scruples casts a magic spell that fills Jokey's prankish exploding packages with real gifts.Reckless Smurfs: "Extreme sports" take on a new meaning when Gargamel puts a daredevil spell on the Smurfs

title: A Loss of Smurf
description: Vanity takes a bog bath that turns him into a Wartmonger.

title: Lazy's Nightmare
description: Lazy's nightmares start coming true when he and the other Smurfs are transported to an evil dream world by Morphio, a wicked sorcerer whose power comes from his victims' fears.

title: All the Smurf's a Stage/Smurfs on Wheels
The Littlest Viking
description: Peewit attempts to prove himself worthy of being a Viking warrior by facing the Stone King.

title: Baby's New Toy/Bringing Up Bigfeet
description: Baby's New Toy: The Smurfs search for a toy that will amuse a bored Baby.Smurfs On The Run: After upsetting the balance of truth and deceit, Gargamel and Sassette must reset it.

title: The Scarlet Croaker
description: The Smurfs are captured by the Wartmongers while picking roots in the Creepeedeepee Swamp, but are rescued by a mysterious Scarlet Croaker.

title: Calling Dr. Smurf/Can't Smurf the Music
description: Calling Dr. Smurf: Dabbler decides to devote himself to the study of medicine.Can't Smurf The Music: The deaf wood elf Laconia teaches the Smurfs that music comes from inside when Chlorhydris casts a spell that does away with musical notes.

title: The Royal Drum
description: None of the Smurfs believes Grandpa's tales exploration and exotic lands -- until an African princess and her amazing animals arrive for a visit.

title: Journey to the Center of the Smurf
description: Journey To The Center Of The Smurf: Miner finds some "dirty rocks" which he uses to keep the Smurfs warm all winter.The Gallant Smurf: Hogatha has a devious plan where she must capture Grandpa Smurf by turning herself into Grandma Smurfette.

title: The Tallest Smurf/Essence of Brainy
description: Sassette's Tooth: Sassette loses her tooth and Gargamel pretends to be the Tooth Fairy to capture the Smurfs.The Tallest Smurf: Gourdy tries to cheer up a depressed Slouchy, who's miserable about being the shortest Smurf.

title: Dr. Evil and Mr. Nice/The Root of Evil
description: Dr. Evil And Mr. Nice: Gargamel suffers from a magic-induced split personality given to him by Scruple.I Smurf To The Trees: All the trees decide to leave the forest once Gargamel makes them come to life.

title: Tattle-Tail Smurfs/Greedy Goes on Strike
description: Greedy feels unappreciated until he meets a gnome king that ends up taking advantage of his talents and ignoring his son.

title: A Myna Problem/The Horn of Plenty
description: Futuresmurfed: A baby dinosaur is released from the past when Lord Balthazar uses Father Time's scythe to cut a hole in the fabric of reality.The Horn Of Plenty: Mother Nature accidentally damages the fall harvest.

title: I Smurf to the Trees/Clumsy's Cloud
Bookworm Smurf/Farmer's Genii
description: Bookworm Smurf: When Sassette wishes all the books in the world to disappear the world stops functioning.Jokey's Cloak: Jokey discovers a magic cloak of invisibility, but his see-through state becomes permanent when he gets wet.

title: The World According to Smurflings/The Enchanted Quill
description: Smurfette's Gift: An imp takes Smurfette for his collection as she gets too nosey about her birthday presents.The World According To Smurflings: The Smurflings misuse Mother Nature's wand and learn about the balance of nature.

title: The Most Unsmurfy Game/Put Upon Puppy
description: The Most Unsmurfy Game: A hunting game has the Smurfs as prey for the Wartmongers.Tattle-Tail Smurfs: Brainy grows tired of the Smurflings tattling on him, and casts a spell that makes their tails grow each time they tell tales.

title: Heart of Gold/The Village Vandal
description: Snappy's Way: The Smurfs are accidentally buried under an avalanche by Snappy and his selfishness.The Village Vandal: Gargamel releases a super-hungry termite into the Smurf Village.

title: Handy's Window Vision/Papa Smurf, Papa Smurf
Lure of the Orb/Smurfette's Flower
description: In this episode with a strong anti-drug message, several Smurfs get a scary lesson in addiction to magic to help them with their problems after meeting a woman with a magical orb.

title: Smurf on the Wild Side: Part 1/Smurf on the Wild Side: Part 2
Smurf on the Wild Side: Part 3/Smurf on the Wild Side: Part 4
The Smurflings' Unsmurfy Friend/The Smurfstalker
description: A mean wood sprite gives the Smurflings some trouble. Sassette gets a trio of living paper dolls from a piece of parchment with a bit of magical formula on it that came from a book belonging to Papa Smurf.

title: Sleepless Smurfs/Cut-Up Smurfs
description: The Smurfs are induced into insomnia by Gargamel and Morphio conspiring together. An accident caused by Clumsy actually saves the Smurfs from Gargamel after a chain of events.

title: Gargamel's Sweetheart
description: Gargamel gets seduced by Evelyn the evil witch to capture the Smurfs.

title: Wild About Smurfette/Sing a Song of Smurflings
Smurfing for Gold/Jokey's Joke Book
description: Gargamel takes Handy's railsmurfer and tries to send the Smurfs on an express-train ride to their doom. A new bag of tricks for Jokey prove to be worse than his usual gift boxes.

title: Poet's Storybook/The Fastest Wizard in the World
description: Magic makes all the things in Poet's story book happen in reality despite that not being his intention. The Smurfs must rescue squirrels from Hogatha who is using the for hair tonic.

title: Dancing Bear/Gargamel's Last Will
description: Slouchy's junk is used by Gargamel to bargain for gold from two men writing a book on forest legends. Puppy bites Gargamel who then believes he'll turn into a dog so he steals Lord Balthazar's sensor crown to capture the Smurfs before he changes.

title: Smurfing the Unicorns/Vanity's Closest Friend
description: All the other Smurfs recognize Nobody as a somebody. Vanity has trouble with an admirer he can't seem to get rid of.

title: Peewit's Unscrupulous Adventure
description: During a celebration at Peewit's kingdom's castle a wicked chamberlain ransacks the place.

title: Scruple and the Great Book of Spells/Bouncing Smurf
description: Scruple brings a glacier over the entire forest after he uses Gargamel's Great Book of Spells to make himself into a powerful wizard.

title: Clockwork Smurfette/I Was a Brainy Weresmurf
description: Brainy gets a little hairy and howls some after he gets scratched by wolf bane. Snappy's new hand puppet comes to life and he gets really attached to it.

title: The Answer Smurf/Vanity's Wild Adventure
description: The Answer Smurf: Slouchy foils Gargamel while all the other smurfs fall under Brainy's charisma spell.No Smurf Is An Island: Feeling unappreciated, Handy builds a Smurfarine and goes to visit Merena the mermaid.

title: To Coin a Smurf/Smurfette Unmade
description: Some of the Smurfs get turned into gold coins by Gargamel which get stolen by thieves.

title: A Long Tale for Grandpa/Where the Wild Smurfs Are
description: Destructive aphids are making their way to the Smurf village and Grandpa Smurf's storytelling is getting in the way of making a brew to stop them.

title: The Magic Sack of Mr. Nicholas/Swapping Smurfs
description: Mr. Nicholas' sack of toys is in jeopardy of being stolen by Chlorhydris and Scruple.

title: Return of Don Smurfo
description: Rescuing his fellow Smurfs from Lord Balthazar allows Flighty to learn how to make decisions. From the pages of his storybook, the real Don Smurfo emerges to experience adventures in the real world.

title: Skyscraper Smurfs/Bad Luck Smurfs
description: Willpower Smurfs: The Smurfs are so busy testing their willpower that they do not see Gargamel spying on them and capturing Harmony. When they tell Papa Smurf about what has happened he goes off to rescue Harmony. Papa Smurf uses a trick box to challenge Gargamel, allowing Harmonyto escape.Clumsy Luck: When Clumsy breaks VanityÂ's mirror Brainy tells him he will have seven years bad luck. Papa Smurf tells Clumsy that it is only superstitious nonsense and not to worry. He gets more and more worried when a series of mishaps are all blamed on his bad luck. Eventually Clumsy flees the village. That night a meteor destroys his house. While the rest of the Smurfs mourn Clumsy, he returns and they all realise how lucky he was to not have been in his house the night before.

title: Smurfing Out of Time/A Hole in Smurf
description: The Smurfs must plug up the River of Time before all time runs out. A drop of rubber tree sap traps Clumsy within.

title: The Smurf Who Could Do No Wrong/Smurfette's Lucky Star
description: Using her last wish Smurfette wishes her fallen wishing star back into the sky.

title: The Smurfy Verdict/Chlorhydris's Lost Love
description: Its Smurf Friendship Day but Chlorhydris tries to ruin it by switching Cupid's love arrows with her black heart arrows.

title: Stop & Go Smurfs/Poet the Know-It-All
description: Hefty meets his match athletically in Wild but can they get along? Lord Balthazar wants an amulet that lets Poet see the future.

title: All the News That's Fit to Smurf
description: Hogatha takes a strong interest in Harmony and his new golden voice. Grandpa Smurf wishes the dangerous scoop that Report's nose for news delivers wouldn't get out.

title: Gargamel's Quest/Gargamel's Second Childhood
description: Gargamel and Scruple switch ages bringing a strange day to Smurf village. Smurf village suffers some pranks when little spirits are accidentally let loose.

title: Lost Smurf
description: A strange castle appears that Grandpa Smurf must travel to after receiving a message on a kite.

title: Archives of Evil
description: The evil sorcerer Nemesis breaks into the Wizards Library's "Archives of Evil" to magically siphon the knowledge from its books. After he captures Papa Smurf to coerce him into revealing the location of the Long Life Stone, it's up to Brainy and Clockwork to save the day.

title: Big Mouth's Roommate/Bungling Babysitters
description: Reporter and the other Smurfs start believing that Gargamel has permanently changed his ways after a misheard comment. While the Smurfs are too busy quarreling, Hogatha captures Baby Smurf for her baby-soft skin formula.

title: Don Smurfo's Uninvited Guests
description: Denisa's doll is used by Gargamel after he changes it so it can catch Smurfs. Some of the Smurfs end up in Don Smurfo's storybook and live some of his adventures.

title: Grandpa's Nemesis
description: An ancient enemy of Grandpa Smurf's has come after him.

title: A House for Nanny
description: The Smurfs do their best to find a houseplant for Nanny.

title: It's a Smurfy Life/Land of Lost and Found
description: Papa Smurf's telescope is lost and in order to get it back Hefty, Handy, and Brainy exchange their best attributes with Scour.

title: Long Live Brainy
description: Being leader of the Trokels teaches Brainy that sometimes leaders have to be followers as well. Puppy is retrained to hunt for Smurfs by Gargamel after he loses his memory.

title: Memory Melons/Nanny's Way
description: Storms are brewing over the forest because of the marital spats between Selwyn and Tallulah.

title: Smoogle Sings the Blues/A Smurf for Denisa
description: Gargamel has Denisa, Lord Balthazar's niece, over to his hovel not expecting her to befriend Sassette.

title: Stealing Grandpa's Thunder
description: A nasty animal trapper is caught in one of his own traps after he trapped both Grandpa Smurf and Wild Smurf. All of Vanity's mirror reflections come to life which seems to make him fade out of existence.

title: Smurfs That Time Forgot: Part 1/Smurfs That Time Forgot: Part 2
description: A prehistoric baby dinosaur is brought through time to the present and the Smurfs try to return him with the help of a magic key.

title: Hogapatra's Beauty Sleep/Mummy Dearest
description: An ancient Egyptian empress suffers from insomnia and it's up to Lazy to teach her how to do what he does best -- sleep!BR> When Gargamel's Egyptian incarnation puts the Smurfs to work on building a monument for his cat pharoah Azra, they wake a mummy!

title: Karate Clumsy/Like It or Smurf It
Papa's Big Snooze
description: Papa Smurf falls into a permanent sleep when a Japanese bug bites him. When on a volcanic paradise, Brainy's version of Double Dare gets dangerous.

title: A Fish Called Snappy/The Smurf Odyssey
description: The Smurfs must help the son of Zeus learn the ways of being a Greek god before going on his quest for the Golden Fleece. Snappy gets turned into a fish when he upsets a water sprite.

title: Fortune Cookie/Imperial Panda-Monium
description: Jokey puts some fortunes of his own into some cookies. The Smurfs must rescue a child emperor from the clutches of Gargamel's ancient Chinese self when he plans on taking over the throne.

title: Smurfette's Green Thumb
description: The Smurfs must rescue a child emperor from the clutches of Gargamel's ancient Chinese self when he plans on taking over the throne. When Smurfette is pricked by a magical plant in the ancient city of Babylon, everything she touches turns into a plant.

title: Hefty Sees a Serpent
description: Nobody believes Hefty when he tells the other Smurfs of a huge serpent until Gargamel's Scottish counterpart captures them. Smurfette becomes a horse jockey to help a Scottish ghost rescue his kidnapped horse.

title: Phantom Bagpiper/Jungle Jitterbug
description: Smurfette becomes a horse jockey to help a Scottish ghost rescue his kidnapped horse. Vanity's dancing feet help bring rain to a South American village.

title: Sky High Surprise
description: The time crystals are stolen from the Smurfs by a band of baby bandits. After trading places with a genie in Baghdad, Clumsy must cure the Sultan's cold or it will be his head!

title: Greedy's Masterpizza/The Monumental Grouch
description: Tailor's Magic Needle: It's spring again and Tailor Smurf announces he will start taking orders for all the Smurfs' new clothes. Soon he has lots of orders and begins work. It is not long before he realises that he has too much work to do. With Brainy he creates a magic sewing needle to help him. Things get worse when the Smurfs realise that the magic needle sews faster than Tailor and he soon finds himself out of work. Once again turning to Brainy for help, they cast a spell on the needle. Now it starts flying round the village undoing things, putting the whole village in danger. Breakfast At Greedy's: Greedy's latest batches of pancakes hav

title: Curried Smurfs
description: Gargamel's Indian counterpart captures the Smurfs and sells them to the Rajah for display in his private zoo.

title: Big Shot Smurfs/No Reflection on Vanity
description: The Smurf Apprentice: Clumsy, wanting to be popular, steals one of Gargamel's magic spells that backfires and turns him into a dragon. Vanity Fare: Gargamel's magic mirror traps Vanity Smurf inside it and Smurfette and Brainy rush to his rescue. Once inside the mirror-world, they cause a giant explosion that shatters the glass enclosure and hurry back to their smurfy village.

title: Papa Loses His Patience/Swashbuckling Smurfs
description: Papa Smurf loses his temper -- just like the bulls chasing the Smurfs around the streets of Spain. Brainy and Greedy are caught up in a civil war between two groups of tiny people off the coast of Spain.

title: Painter's Egg-Cellent Adventure/Small Minded Smurfs
description: Painter must get a magic chicken in Russia to start laying painted eggs again.

title: Bananas Over Hefty/The Smurfs of the Round Table
description: In Camelot the Smurfs must restore honor to the kingdom and regain control of the mighty Excalibur which is in the hands of the evil Morgan Le Fay.
